title: One Witch at a Time
description: In this reimagining of "Jack and the Beanstalk," an unsuspecting girl brings one witch's magic into another witch's province, stirring certain disaster. "A satisfying, standalone sequel." --KIRKUS. "A clever blend of folkloric elements with fast-paced action." --SLJ. "An original, heartfelt novel." --BCCB
author: Stacy DeKeyser
